reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress versatile, noting it can be dressed up or down, and appreciate its flattering design that accentuates the waist and gathers at the middle section. The dress receives positive feedback for its comfort, quality, and color options, with one customer specifically mentioning its soft blue shade. While the material quality receives mixed reviews, with some finding it nice while others describe it as thin, customers generally like the fit, particularly noting the sleeves are not too tight. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality and price point
items.body: This dress is beautiful! The material is soft and flowy, but has a substantial weight to it so it is not flimsy. And the workmanship of the dress is excellent. I wore it to my son's wedding and I was so comfortable all evening. And it even has hidden pockets on each side of the dress to carry a tissue to dab away my tears of joy! The price for this dress was very reasonable too. I ordered this dress in my normal size (medium, 8-10) and the fit was perfect. I was very pleased with this purchase and highly recommend this dress. Read more
items.author: Lake gal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress
items.body: Beautiful color blue, beautiful dress, nice quality for the price. I feel very special in the dress. The fit is perfect. I ordered a large. I am 150 pounds and 5‚Äô3‚Äù and thought for sure it would be too long, but it is actually the perfect length. I took it on a cruise two weeks ago and it was perfect for a little dress up evening. Read more
items.author: Barb Larsen

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice! 2 small downsides - pockets & print
items.body: Really conservative and flattering dress! I definitely recommend! It would have been nice to have specified that the brown print dress is cheetah print; I'd assumed the print was small flowers. However, it still looks very nice, and only up super close can that detail be observed. Another downside is the pockets. I always love those dresses with pockets, but these were bulky and noticeable. Other than those two small things, I love the dress! Read more
items.author: Drea

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, flattering, and perfect for summer!
items.body: I absolutely love this dress! The colors are vibrant and fun, and the floral print gives it such a cheerful, boho vibe. The smocked top is very flattering and stretchy, making it comfortable to wear all day while still giving a nice shape. I also love the flowy skirt‚Äîit moves beautifully and is light enough for warm weather. The length is perfect, hitting right at the ankles for a classy maxi look, and the ruffle sleeves add a cute feminine touch. It‚Äôs versatile enough to dress up with heels and jewelry or keep casual with sandals and a sunhat. The quality exceeded my expectations for the price‚Äîit feels well-made and washes nicely without shrinking or fading. This is definitely going to be one of my go-to dresses for spring and summer! Read more
items.author: SandyMolina

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fabric makes you sweat
items.body: Fits great but fabric is NOT breathable!! In warm weather, you'll sweat for sure! Read more
items.author: DME

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and Comfortable: A Must-Have Dress!
items.body: I recently purchased this dress, and I must say, I absolutely love it! It's the epitome of comfort and style combined. This lightweight garment feels like a dream on the skin and fits true to size. Standing at 5'0, I opted for a medium size, and it gracefully reaches down to my ankles, which is perfect for my height. One notable aspect is its absence of a liner, but don't let that concern you; it's not see-through at all. The fabric maintains its integrity while offering breathability and freedom of movement. Plus, the smocking detail adds a touch of elegance while providing a flattering shape to the waist. The smocking is delightfully stretchy, ensuring comfort without compromising on style. I love this dress so much that I plan to purchase it in a different color. Its versatility makes it suitable for various occasions, whether a casual day out or a more formal gathering. I highly recommend this dress to anyone looking for a chic, comfortable addition to their wardrobe. Read more
items.author: MiMi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Lag BaOmer!!
items.body: I purchased this item for a Lag BaOmer Party and because my favorite option wouldn‚Äôt be available in-time. I ordered Sizes S, M, and L. The Small was fine, but was a bit too snug across the shoulders, so I went with the Medium. It was roomy enough for small shoulder pads (a standard practice since my shoulders are small and to balance-out by bigger bottom üòÄ). The dress is a bit high waisted, which is definitely my preference. As others have noted, the material is alittle thin, but adding a longish full-slip solved that issue. I was very pleased with the dress since the colors are fun and fit the Party-Theme; it is modest enough that my more observant friends were comfortable around me; it was cool enough for my kitchen apron, assistance with the final meal prep, and our southern afternoon/evening temperatures;; it can be styled ‚Äúup or down,‚Äù depending on your accessories; and because I received several compliments on this dress‚Ä¶. Amazon was great and allowed me to return the items (sizes) I didn‚Äôt need‚Ä¶. Sizing Info‚Äî I am 5‚Äô4‚Äù, weigh 140lbs, and selected the sSize Medium. Read more
items.author: Shalviya

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, comfy, a bit short on a 5'10"
items.body: Its a good non cheap feeling dress. First well. I'm 5 foot 10 and 136 lbs. In a small, it fits.. The length is an inch higher than the picture on the model though. So I docked a star. It feels comfortable and looks very nice but modest. I think it is a highly cute summer dress. I will probably buy another. Which I can not say about a lot of my experiences online dress shopping. My husband wanted me wearing a modest dress, so we both chose this.. But.. It is so cute looking, I'm concerned he might not let me keep it. If that gives you an idea what it looks like in person. I will say the model doesn't do justice Read more
items.author: Marykate

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Big Floral Orange, Floral Coffee White, Solid Royal Blue, Dot Blue White, Solid Orange, Solid Grey Blue, Solid Light Blue, Dot Apricot Brown, Dot Green White, Floral Black White, Print Rose Red, Dot Apricot Coffee, Solid Black, Print Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
